periodicity: ∃ T > 0 such that Ψ(χ + T) = Ψ(χ) for FSMs.
truth_invariance: Π(Ψ_FSM) = Π_const (truth signature invariant across χ).
normalization_stability: Σ(Ψ_FSM) = Ψ_FSM (FSM is a fixed point of Σ).
metric_positivity: μ(R) > 0 everywhere within the FSM support (μ-positivity).
curvature_compatibility: λ(R) must remain finite and compatible with Ω (no forbidden singularities).
layer_coherence: ρ is constant or piecewise-constant across the FSM domain; no cross-layer tearing without explicit transition rules.
rank_integrity: FSM formation may not change the tensor rank of D_{ijk…}.
